title: 关于chestcommands配置文件设置
author: tong123456
txt_content: 求Chestcommands配置文件example文件的详细设置方法，mcbbs上的教程不是特别懂，最重要的是如何设置多个指令的，也可以加我QQ874316249帮助我设置，新人求罩么么哒QAQ

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content:
menu-settings:
  name: '&6&l示例菜单'
#菜单名字 
  rows: 5
#菜单行数
  command: 'menu'
#打开菜单用的指令
  open-with-item:
    id: '347'
#打开菜单用的道具
    right-click: true
#右键开启true为是false为否
    left-click: false
#左键开启，同上
menua:
  COMMAND: 'help;spawn'
#指令，多个指令间用；隔开
  NAME: '&d&l称号兑换'
#名称
  LORE:
#描述
    - '&9收集物品兑换称号'
    - '&1选择最适合你的称号吧！'
  ID: 323
#图标的id
  POSITION-X: 8
#行数
  POSITION-Y: 3
#列数
复制代码
就这样

replies.author: 伊藤布哥
replies.txt_content:
######################
#+                  +#
#   MENU SETTINGS    #
#+                  +#
######################

menu-settings:
  name: '&b小助手'
  rows: 3
  command: 'menu'
  auto-refresh: 5
  open-action: 'sound: note pling; tell:'
  open-with-item:
    id: 345
    left-click: false
    right-click: true


######################
#+                  +#
#       ITEMS        #
#+                  +#
######################


gates:
  NAME: '&e&l◎ &c&lＯ&e&lm&a&lG&f[Jp_word_of]&b&l傳送服務&e[v]'
  ID: 431
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1
  
cmdboos:
  COMMAND: 'open:cmdbooks.yml'
  NAME: '&e&l◎ &c&lＯ&e&lm&a&lG&f[Jp_word_of]&6&l指令百科&a[WiKi]'
  LORE:
    - '&7檢視所有必要知道的指令&a！'
  ID: 137
  POSITION-X: 2
  POSITION-Y: 1
  
DepartmentStores:
  COMMAND: 'warp Shopping'
  NAME: '&e&l◎ &c&lＯ&e&lm&a&lG&f[Jp_word_of]&9&l百貨公司&e[bow-knot]'
  LORE:
    - '&7買一下日常用品吧&a！'
  ID: 328
  ENCHANTMENT: durability, 1
  POSITION-X: 3
  POSITION-Y: 1

SellItem:
  COMMAND: 'givemoney: 99'
  REQUIRED-ITEM: 367, 64
  NAME: '&f[Skull]&a&l伺服器收購腐肉&f[Skull]'
  LORE: 
  - '&7&l腐肉 &e64:$99'
  ID: 367
  POSITION-X: 6
  POSITION-Y: 1
  
SellItem1:
  COMMAND: 'givemoney: 50'
  REQUIRED-ITEM: 4, 64
  NAME: '&f[Skull]&a&l伺服器收購鵝軟石&f[Skull]'
  LORE:
  - '&7&l鵝軟石 &e64:$50'
  ID: 4
  POSITION-X: 6
  POSITION-Y: 2
  
OmGServerInfo-en:
  NAME: '&e&nO&c&nm&a&nG&4 &bServer &cRule - en:'
  LORE:
    - '&4Strictly forbid:'
    - '1.Don‘t Harassment、Fraud Someone、'
    - 'or broken and steal Blocks.'
    - '※ First time Jail 3hr,＋3hr and so forth.'
    - '2.forbid vituperation , Foul mouth,Arrogant.'
    - '※ First time mute 30m ,＋30m and so forth.'
    - '3.forbid down pit straight(can be classified as a trap),'
    - '&7Backfill to the surface for'
    - 'at least five spaces above or fenced.'
    - '※ First time Jail 3hr,＋3hr and so forth.'
  ID: paper
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 2
  
OmGServerInfo-tw:
  NAME: '&e&nO&c&nm&a&nG&4 &b伺服器&c規章 - tw:'
  LORE:
    - '&4嚴禁:'
    - '1.嚴禁騷擾、詐騙他人、或破壞他人建築以及偷竊物品，'
    - '※ 初犯刑求監獄3hr，再犯刑求6hr，＋3hr以此類推。'
    - '2.禁止謾罵(含髒話)，嘴臭，嗆聲，自大，自以為。'
    - '※ 初犯刑求禁言30m，再犯刑求60m，＋30m以此類推。'
    - '3.嚴禁往下挖掘面積狹窄的深坑&直坑(可被歸類為陷阱的坑洞)，'
    - '至少要回填至地表5格以上或用柵欄圍住。'
    - '※ 初犯刑求監獄3hr，再犯刑求6hr。＋3hr以此類推。'
  ID: paper
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 2
  POSITION-Y: 2
  
mypet-help:
  COMMAND: 'open:petmenu.yml'
  NAME: '&e&l◎ &cＯ&em&aG&f[Jp_word_of]&d&l寵物小幫手&e[v]'
  ID: 122
  POSITION-X: 3
  POSITION-Y: 2
  
VIPDonation:
  COMMAND: 'open:vip.yml'
  NAME: '&4[&4&LNEW&4] &bVIP&c 捐贈'
  LORE:
    - '&7VIPⅠ  &e$10 &aUSD'
    - '&6VIPⅡ &e$20 &aUSD'
    - '&bVIPⅢ &e$30 &aUSD'
    - '&9VIPⅣ &e$40 &aUSD'
  ID: 321
  ENCHANTMENT: durability, 1
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 3

menu-close-no-commands-no-lore:
  NAME: '&6關閉主選單'
  ID: 77
  POSITION-X: 9
  POSITION-Y: 3

复制代码

replies.author: hear_brave
replies.txt_content:
######################
#+                  +#
#   MENU SETTINGS    #
#+                  +#
######################

menu-settings:

  # name - appears as the title - REQUIRED
  name: '      &6&l╬╬&b&l这里是显示名字&6&l╬╬'

  # rows - the number of rows of the chest - REQUIRED
  rows: 菜单共有多少行

  # command - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  command: '打开菜单需要输入什么指令不用加/'

  # open-with-item - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or
  # set the item-id/data-value to 0)
  # In this case it will open with a book (right click)
  open-with-item:
    item-id: 347
    left-click: true
    right-click: true
    data-value: 0

######################
#+                  +#
#       ITEMS        #
#+                  +#
######################
1:
  COMMAND: 'spawn'
  NAME: ' &9回主城'
  LORE:
    - '&b回主城！'
    - '&e复我浩荡中华！'
  ENCHANTMENT: 'sharpness, 5'
  ID: 399
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 3
  POSITION-Y: 2
